org.jikesrvm.compilers.opt.mir2mc

Class MachineCodeOffsets

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jikesrvm.compilers.opt.mir2mc.MachineCodeOffsets

  • public final class MachineCodeOffsets
extends Object
    Saves machine code offsets during the compilation of the method.

    Information that is needed at runtime is saved in other classes, e.g. OptMachineCodeMap.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Map<Instruction,Integer> mcOffsets

    • Method Detail

      • setMachineCodeOffset

        public void setMachineCodeOffset(Instruction inst,
                                 int mcOffset)
        This method is only for use by opt assemblers to generate code. It sets the machine code offset of the instruction as described in getMachineCodeOffset(Instruction).
        Parameters:
        inst - the instruction whose offset will be set
        mcOffset - the offset (in bytes) for the instruction

      • getMachineCodeOffset

        public int getMachineCodeOffset(Instruction inst)
        Gets the offset into the machine code array (in bytes) that corresponds to the first byte after this instruction.

        This method only returns a valid value after it has been set as a side-effect of a call to generateCode in AssemblerOpt during final assembly.

        To get the offset in INSTRUCTIONs you must shift by LG_INSTRUCTION_SIZE.

        Parameters:
        inst - the instruction whose offset is queried
        Returns:
        the offset (in bytes) of the machinecode instruction generated for the IR instruction in the final machinecode
        Throws:
        OptimizingCompilerException - when no machine code offset is present for the instruction

      • lacksMachineCodeOffset

        public boolean lacksMachineCodeOffset(Instruction inst)
        Checks whether a machine code offset is missing for the instruction.
        Parameters:
        inst - the instruction to check
        Returns:
        true if the instruction never had a machine code offset set

      • fabricateMachineCodeOffsetForPrologueInstruction

        public void fabricateMachineCodeOffsetForPrologueInstruction(Instruction instr)
        Fabricates an offset for prologue instructions in methods that are not interruptible to deal with an oddity.

        Note: General clients must not call this method.

        Parameters:
        instr - a prologue instruction in a method that's not interruptible
